individual_records.evidence_sentence: The Kv11.1-A561V human variant results in mutant protein degradation by the proteasome.

functional_data.summary: The variant causes trafficking dysfunction leading to reduced Kv11.1 current density.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on functional assays and clinical correlation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with long-QT syndrome type 2 and has been studied in various patient cohorts.
key_quotes: Most disease-causing hERG variants instigate trafficking dysfunction.
